arts.ttl: Clinical RB Leipzig end winless streak against spirited Holstein Kiel side
arts.sum: RB Leipzig secured a crucial 2-0 win against Holstein Kiel, thanks to goals from Šeško and Silva. Just before half-time, Finn Porath tested Péter Gulácsi with a shot, but the Leipzig keeper was equal to it, ensuring his side went into the break with their lead intact.

arts.ttl: Holstein Kiel vs RB Leipzig preview: Two out of form sides battle
arts.sum: Holstein Kiel host RB Leipzig on Saturday, with the home side needing a win to get closer to escaping the relegation zone and closing the five-point gap. Leipzig, however, are high off a big win against Frankfurt in midweek.

arts.ttl: PSG’s €80m-rated forward Xavi Simons targeted by Arsenal and Liverpool
arts.sum: Xavi Simons (21), currently on loan at RB Leipzig, has an uncertain future. Despite being re-signed by Paris Saint-Germain two summers ago, he is yet to establish himself at the…

arts.ttl: What PSG’s pursuit of Victor Osimhen means for RB Leipzig
arts.sum: RB Leipzig’s pursuit of a No. 9 is well documented and with Paris Saint-Germain interested in Victor Osimhen (25), this could pave the way for Randal Kolo Muani to relocate…

arts.ttl: Preview: Holstein Kiel vs. RB Leipzig - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Holstein Kiel and RB Leipzig, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
